text: Garrett Yim (also known as May Yim) is a Los Angeles based musician who releases electronic music under the name Meishi Smile. The name Meishi Smile was first used in 2010. Yim's music has elements of noise music, J-pop and shoegaze. ==Career== In 2014, the first Meishi Smile album, LUST, was released on Attack The Music and Zoom Lens. Later that year, Yim released a new single called Star on Maltine Records. In January 2015, MAY debuted their first video on national television on Adult Swim with the video "AJS." On May 21, 2015, MAY announced through an interview with The Fader that he was working on a forthcoming album entitled ...Belong A week later on May 28, 2015, MAY premiered a new single entitled Breathe. ==Discography== ===Studio albums (as Meishi Smile)=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center;" |+ !
